p:
Self-propulsion can be modeled by means of a force vector, applied on the center of mass of each microswimmer with dynamics independent on the particle position
1, 3 . In particular, we consider a two-dimensional system of N interacting active particles, whose dynamics is described by over-damped Langevin equations for the positions, x
i , of each particle:
